channel.title: projects on Website of Shruthi Rao
channel.description: Recent content in projects on Website of Shruthi Rao

item.title: Shiwu
item.description: Shiwu is a soil type detector and crop suggester that aims to promote sustainable agriculture.

item.title: CodeStrup
item.description: CodeStrup is a web app which aims to teach users basic data structures.

item.title: MaskifAI
item.description: MaskifAI is a mask detection web app which can be used by an organization to ensure that their employees wear a mask while entering the workspace.

item.title: TeachUs
item.description: TeachUs is a community by teachers, for teachers. The onset of the COVID-19 pandemic has forced both students and teachers alike to rely on online resources to learn and teach.
